Header: 7 SLAWC Soldiers Buy School Accessories to Mailady Students
Content: Deserving students at the Urani Primary School in Mailady received school accessories and stationery, following an initiative taken by the Commanding Officer of 7 Sri Lanka Women’s Corps (SLAWC) of the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J). The programme saw 13 children of needy families receive those school accessories as gifts from the 7 SLAWC on account of the World Children’s Day. It took place on Tuesday (1).
